metadata.title: AIOU completes admission process for PhD & MPhil Programs

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Mar 17 (APP):Allama Iqbal Open University (AIOU) has successfully completed the admission process for its Spring 2025 semester, including entry tests and interviews for MS/MPhil and PhD programs. The University has released the merit lists, and successful candidates are required to submit their first-semester fees by March 21 to confirm their admissions, said a press release on Monday. The merit lists are available on the university's official website, where applicants can verify their selection. Additionally, all successful candidates have been notified via SMS and email to ensure timely submission of fees. A total of 276 students have qualified for MS/MPhil admissions, including 89 students from the Faculty of Education, 123 from the Faculty of Social Sciences & Humanities, 51 from the Faculty of Sciences, and 14 from the Faculty of Arabic & Islamic Studies. For PhD programs, 61 students have been selected, including 35 from the Faculty of Education, 5 from the Faculty of Social Sciences & Humanities, 9 from the Faculty of Sciences, and 12 from the Faculty of Arabic & Islamic Studies. The university administration has advised all successful candidates to submit their fees within the given deadline to secure their admission. For further information, students can visit the official university website or contact the relevant departments.
